Reviews.Content: stayed family family duplex situated basement fantastic view quiet seminar view river wonderful hotel nicely situated quiet environment spree tube station walk walking distance hour reichstag park breakfast buffet restaurant hotel nice german wines funny singer degree nice gym dont expect 1000 sqm hall enjoyable relax terrasse river savour coffee morning beer night

Reviews.Title: “Hotel on Spree River near Brandenburg Gate”

Reviews.Content: excellant hotel terms breakfast location stayed triple standard actually floors spiral stair leading nice spacious feel clean comfortable modern breakfast class beyond usual continental arrangement cold meats rolls cheeses etc addition hot foods including scrambled egg sausages bacon etc included bb rate location attractive location spree river 2025 mins walk brandenburg gate reichstag nice local im hotel 1012 euros main course portions

Reviews.Content: stayed colleagues 5 nights location central tranquil couple train stations nearby 15 minutes berlin tegel airport housekeeping trashes toiletry items happened significant plus colleagues soap bar conditioner time 3 towels 2 rule coffee awful trust service limited amount items pretty expensive kept cool additional blankets somehow giving electric heater overall hotel bad

Reviews.Title: “So Very Nearly An 'Excellent' Rating!”
Reviews.Author: lovetravelling012
Reviews.Content: stayed nights sight berlin location excellent five minute walk bellevue bahn station trains minutes walk station safe interior ministry building door hotel police patrols day night appears pleasant anyway hotel converted dairy banks river spree set business travellers mid week bar restaurant hotel huge selection whisky cocktails staff friendly helpful cigar welcome huge selection cigars reasonable prices thats reason didnt hotel excellent rating slightly underwhelming food menu available evening food perfectly acceptable little variation nice meant youll forced eat elsewhere isnt bad breakfast standard german combination cold meats cheeses fruit various options start day overall stay thoroughly recommend stay quiet location near centre berlin

Reviews.Content: beds shame otherwise hotel amazing location decor cleanliness staff wonderful beds hard ache sidebar history troubles experience hotels european tour friend trouble sleeping bed

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”

Reviews.Content: arrived bit culture shocked time germany front desk extremely helpful spoke excellent english afraid german ready arrived hours bags returned wonderful riverside view windows comfortable king bed maid service excellent everyday left chocolates night 3 week stay enjoyed breakfast included price whenever front desk recommended excellent late night italian restaurant gf appreciated definitely stay time im berlin
